How beautiful <S%H4998><s%> upon the mountains <S%H2022><s%> are the feet <S%H7272><s%> of him that brings good news <S%H1319><s%>, that publishes <S%H8085><s%> peace <S%H7965><s%>; that brings good news <S%H1319><s%> of good <S%H2896><s%>, that publishes <S%H8085><s%> salvation <S%H3444><s%>; that says <S%H559><s%> unto Zion <S%H6726><s%>, Your God <S%H430><s%> reigns <S%H4427><s%>!

For you shall not go out <S%H3318><s%> with haste <S%H2649><s%>, nor go <S%H3212><s%> by flight <S%H4499><s%>: for the Lord <S%H3068><s%> will go <S%H1980><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> you <S%H430><s%>; and the God of Israel <S%H3478><s%> will be your rear <S%H622><s%>.

As many <S%H7227><s%> were astonished <S%H8074><s%> at you <S%H4758><s%>; his visage was so marred <S%H4893><s%> more than any man <S%H376><s%>, and his form <S%H8389><s%> more than the sons <S%H1121><s%> of men <S%H120><s%>:
